children.tooltip: Open/close the barcode scanner. If the barcode of the item cannot be detected, try toggling the mirror camera button on the bottom left and try again. The barcode should display automatically.

Open/close the barcode scanner. If the barcode of the item cannot be detected, try toggling the mirror camera button on the bottom left and try again. The barcode should display automatically.

children.labelTooltip: Cannot find product? You must add the product first.
